title: Add daily calorie burn goal setting

requirements.text: Add a backend function to set a daily calorie burn goal (numeric value) for the authenticated user

quotes: Make you be able to set daily goals for calories

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores a daily calorie goal value per user Principal
Function accepts a numeric goal value and persists it
Goal value can be updated by calling the function again

requirements.text: Add a backend function to retrieve the current daily calorie burn goal for the authenticated user

quotes: Make you be able to set daily goals for calories

acceptanceCriteria: Function returns the stored daily goal value for the current user
Returns a default value (e.g., 0 or null) if no goal has been set

requirements.text: Create a frontend form component to allow users to set their daily calorie burn goal with input validation

quotes: Make you be able to set daily goals for calories

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes a numeric input field for the daily goal
Input validates that the value is a positive number
Form displays success/error feedback after submission
Form is accessible to authenticated users only

requirements.text: Display the user's current daily calorie burn goal in the dashboard summary section

quotes: Make you be able to set daily goals for calories

acceptanceCriteria: Daily goal is fetched and displayed in the CaloriesSummary component or nearby
Shows a visual indicator of progress toward the daily goal (e.g., percentage or progress bar)
Updates automatically when the goal is changed

constraints: Store daily goals per user Principal in the backend
Maintain the single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
Only authenticated users can set or view their daily goals
nonGoals: Historical goal tracking or goal history
